strings.text:
[Speaker]: Hello, [Player Field 43].
Very good of you to come.[Clear Window][Speaker]: If you plan to take the Orre 
Colosseum challenge, go to the reception 
area there.[Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: It's too bad how things 
turned out this time.
Still, it was to be expected since there were
so many tough Trainers.[Clear Window][Speaker]: Go off and train some more.
Everyone will be looking forward to a battle with
you, [Player Field 43].[Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: Congratulations!
My hat's off to you for a most splendid victory![Clear Window][Speaker]: In recognition of your brave 
achievement, [Player Field 43], [MsgID 77]
has conferred on you a new title.[Clear Window][Speaker]: This is it.
Do accept it.[Dialogue End]

[Player Field 43] received the title
"[MsgID 77]"
from Eagun![Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: This title seems to express 
[MsgID 77]'s feelings.[Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: [Player Field 43].
Don't be satisfied with this victory.
Keep up with your training![Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: Congratulations!
My hat's off to you for a most splendid victory![Clear Window][Speaker]: However, don't be satisfied 
with this victory.
Keep up with training every day![Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: Welcome to the Orre Colosseum.[Clear Window][Speaker]: At the Orre Colosseum, we use different
rules from the Pyrite and Realgam
Colosseums.[Clear Window][Speaker]: If you wish, I can explain the rules.
Would you like me to do that?

[Speaker]: That's fine, then.
If you need anything, please feel free to 
let me know.[Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: Welcome to the Orre Colosseum.
How may I serve you today?
[7]{01}Enter
[7]{01}Cancel
[Speaker]: Which topic would you like me to explain?
[7]{01}Orre Colosseum
Set Style: Single
Set Style: Double

[Speaker]: At the Orre Colosseum, battles
are conducted.
You are permitted to battle with 6 Pokémon.[Clear Window][Speaker]: Battles are held in knockout style.
You must beat four trainers in a row to win 
the challenge.[Clear Window][Speaker]: If you win a challenge, you may advance to
the next group of opponents.[Clear Window][Speaker]: If you manage to win a round, you will be
awarded Poké Coupons.[Clear Window][Speaker]: You can choose to compete in
single or double battles through
this menu.[Dialogue End]
[Speaker]: Battle Style set to Single.[Dialogue End]
[Speaker]: Battle Style set to Double.[Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: Perhaps you should make a challenge to gain
experience.
Are you ready to enter?
[Speaker]: Please let me know when you are ready.[Dialogue End]
[Speaker]: Which set would you like to challenge?
[7]{01}Lovrina
[7]{01}Snattle
[7]{01}Gorigan
[7]{01}Gonzap
[7]{01}Ardos
[7]{01}Eldes
[7]{01}StarsMmd

[Speaker]: Thank you.[Clear Window][Speaker]: Let the Orre Colosseum Battles begin! 
Please, go in![Dialogue End]
[7]{01}Please choose four Pokémon.
[7]{01}Enter
[7]{01}Summary
[7]{01}Cancel
[Speaker]: Are you happy with these choices?

Your party isn't a full one.
It has fewer than six Pokémon.[Clear Window]Please fill your party with six different Pokémon,
then make a new challenge.[Dialogue End]

There is at least one Shadow Pokémon 
in your party.
Shadow Pokémon are prohibited.[Clear Window]Please store your Shadow Pokémon in the PC 
Storage System, then make a new challenge.[Dialogue End]

There is at least one Egg in your party.
Please store Eggs in the PC Storage System,
then make a new challenge.[Dialogue End]

[Pokemon 78] is a Pokémon that is prohibited 
from entry.[Clear Window]Please store [Pokemon 78] in the PC Storage 
System, then make a new challenge.[Dialogue End]

Identical kinds of Pokémon are in your party.
Only one Pokémon of each kind may be
entered.[Clear Window]Please store the extra Pokémon in the PC 
Storage System, then make a new challenge.[Dialogue End]

A Pokémon holding the item
[Item 45] may not enter.[Clear Window]Please take the [Item 45] from the Pokémon,
then make a new challenge.[Dialogue End]

There are Pokémon holding the same kinds of 
items.
Items held by your Pokémon must be all 
different.[Clear Window]Please take the extra items from the Pokémon, 
then make a new challenge.[Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: Thank you for visiting.
We look forward to your next challenge.[Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: Thank you for entering![Clear Window][Speaker]: And congratulations! 
Here are your Poké Coupons for winning 
your challenge.[Dialogue End]

[Player Field 43] received
[Quantity 47] Poké Coupons![Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: You have also won a special award provided
by Mr. Eagun, the Orre Colosseum's
President.[Clear Window][Speaker]: Please go see Mr. Eagun to claim it.[Dialogue End]
[Speaker]: Mr. Eagun is waiting to see you.[Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: Congratulations for your marvelous victory.
We look forward to your next challenge.[Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: That is all I can tell you.
I will be happy to give you this information 
whenever you like.[Clear Window][Speaker]: Please feel free to approach me for
information.[Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: Let the Orre Colosseum Battle
No. [Quantity 47] begin!

I so was #Impressed by your toughness!
I'll let you in on my #SecretResearch![Clear Window]We use special TMs called Shadow Machines
to force pokémon to learn those
#Dank Shadow Moves.
                                      Lovrina[Dialogue End]

In the near future, when I become the 
Governor of Orre, I shall appoint you as my
official secretary.[Clear Window]Let that be a motivation for you to constantly 
better your skills.
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　Snattle[Dialogue End]

You're some kind of special.
You're worthy of sharing my camaraderie 
as a friend.[Clear Window]I therefore award you the title "Hexagonal Bolt 
of Friendship Holder."[Clear Window]The Hexagonal Bolt of Friendship is the perfect
fit for my wrench, and is its truest friend.[Clear Window]In a spirit of unchanging friendship,
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　      Gorigan[Dialogue End]

It's a rotten shame, but you're in a way bigger 
league than Snagem Gang.
It's sad, but Snagem Gang's not big enough 
for you.[Clear Window]I'll do the next best thing.
I'll make you an honorary member of Team 
Snagem.[Clear Window]If you get sick of your life, come to us anytime. 
You're always welcome.
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　         Gonzap[Dialogue End]

In all of Orre, I've never seen a Pokémon 
Trainer of your caliber.[Clear Window]You appear to be the biggest threat to Cipher.[Clear Window]To make sure my underlings watch you with 
caution, I give you the title "Cipher's Biggest 
Enemy."[Clear Window]From now on, Cipher's battle crews will be 
constantly tracking you.
Watch yourself.
　　　　　                             Ardos[Dialogue End]

I'm satisfied that I was able to battle to 
my heart's content.[Clear Window]I would like to confer on you the title 
"Super Star."[Clear Window]With your skills, you shouldn't lose against even
the best Trainers from around the world.
I guarantee it.[Clear Window]Let us meet again.
　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　         Eldes[Dialogue End]

Well done for completing Orre colosseum!
Try Mt. battle if you haven't beaten it yet.
There are some nice surprises at the top.[Clear Window]Thanks for playing this hack and
follow me on twitter @StarsMmd
to keep up with my latest hacks.
　　　　　                             StarsMmd[Dialogue End]
Lovrina Fan Club Member No. 1
Orre Governor's Secretary Candidate
Hexagonal Bolt of Friendship Holder
Honorary Snagem Gang Member
Cipher's Biggest Enemy
Eldes's Top Rival
Super Star

[Speaker]: Also, I have a reward for 
you, too.
Go on, take it.[Dialogue End]

[Player Field 43] received the
gift [Item 45].[Dialogue End]
[7]{01}Cancel Entry
The mail message is cut off...[Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: I'm sorry.
Please don't go any farther.[Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: Next!
Your second-round battle![Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: This is the third round!
Battle tough![Dialogue End]

[Speaker]: This is it!
The final battle!
Battle your toughest![Dialogue End]
